author: daniel_1130
content:
Hello, 
I can see the function to add more than one royalty wallet for royalty distribute. However ERC2891 only supports one wallet address for royalty distribute.
How to solve this issue on opensea? Is it using Royalty splitter? In this case is it distirubte automatically or need kind of claim action?

author: sky.cactus
content: This isn't the right place to seek support for things built on top of Ethereum, this is for discussion about the Ethereum core protocol.  I recommend reaching out to OpenSea for details on how their system works.
